SELECT A.* FROM TB_CM08M01 A INNER JOIN TB_CM15M01 B ON A.COMON_CD = B.COMON_CD AND B.USER_ID = #{userId}
AND B.FILE_LIST = 'Y'
AND B.FILE_UP = 'Y'
AND B.FILE_DOWN = 'Y'
AND B.FILE_UPDATE = 'Y'
AND B.FILE_DELETE = 'Y'
AND 1 = 0
